Module com.example.muhammad_chambers_c482_pa
Package com.example.muhammad.chambers.c482.pa.model

Class FilteredHelperClass

java.lang.Object
com.example.muhammad.chambers.c482.pa.model.FilteredHelperClass
public class FilteredHelperClass extends Object
This class is a data container to help with storing the data for the search box filter.

    • getFilteredParts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> getFilteredParts()
      This is the getFilteredParts method. This method returns the filteredParts list.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of Part objects

    • getFilteredProducts

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getFilteredProducts()
      This is the getFilteredProducts method. This method returns the filteredProducts list.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of Product objects

    • filterPart

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> filterPart(javafx.scene.control.TextField searchBox)
      This is the filterPart method. This method compares the inputted name from the searchBox TextField to Parts names in the allParts list and adds any matches to the filteredParts list.
      Parameters:
      searchBox - the TextField searchBox
      Returns:
      Returns a list of Part objects

    • filterProduct

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> filterProduct(javafx.scene.control.TextField searchBox)
      This is the filterProduct method. This method compares the inputted name from the searchBox TextField to Products names in the allProducts list and adds any matches to the filteredProducts list.
      Parameters:
      searchBox - the TextField searchBox
      Returns:
      Returns a list of Product objects

    • clearPartsListWithItems

      public static void clearPartsListWithItems(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> list)
      This is the clearPartsListWithItems method. This method removes all items from the Parts list if there are any.
      Parameters:
      list - a Part list to clear all of its contents

    • clearProductsListWithItems

      public static void clearProductsListWithItems(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> list)
      This is the clearProductsListWithItems method. This method removes all items from the Products list if there are any.
      Parameters:
      list - a Product list to clear all of its contents
